title: $150K MiniMax AI Agent Challenge — Build Smarter, Risk Bolder, Win Bigger!
raw_excerpt:
We’re inviting developers, innovators, and AI tinkerers from around the world to join our MiniMax AI Agent competition — with $150,000 in total prizes up for grabs.
 📅 Competition details & sign-up: 
 - https://minimax-agent-hackathon.space.minimax.io/
 - https://lu.ma/2u17h1zw
 If you’ve ever thought, “I could make something amazing with AI”, now’s the time. This is your chance to push the limit
raw_body:
We’re inviting developers, innovators, and AI tinkerers from around the world to join our MiniMax AI Agent competition — with $150,000 in total prizes up for grabs.
 📅 Competition details & sign-up: 
 - https://minimax-agent-hackathon.space.minimax.io/
 - https://lu.ma/2u17h1zw
 If you’ve ever thought, “I could make something amazing with AI”, now’s the time. This is your chance to push the limits of what AI agents can do — whether in productivity, creativity, education, entertainment, or entirely new frontiers.
 📅 Key Dates
  
 Aug 11 — Challenge begins
  Aug 25 — Final call for submissions
  Sept 1 — Winners announced
  
 🎁 Special for r/ChatGPT: 
 If you enter the challenge and post your project link in the comments below, you’ll be entered into a raffle for a free r/ChatGPT membership.
 https://preview.redd.it/kr2ry6smciif1.png?width=1600&format=png&auto=webp&s=1e65f0d08a6576c24ec2631261784761285ec1d2
 What’s MiniMax Agent?
 Access MiniMax Agent 
 It’s a powerful AI super-assistant for long-horizon, complex tasks — no code required. 
 It can:
  
 Turn ideas into fully-built apps/websites in under an hour
  Handle multimodal tasks (text, image, audio, video)
  Uses MCP to coordinate specialized AI subagents like coders, designers & researchers —to tackle tasks together
  
https://reddit.com/link/1mny13h/video/cp2lnzcpciif1/player
 What do i need to do?
 Step 1: Register on https://minimax-agent-hackathon.space.minimax.io/
 Step 2: Once registered, you’ll receive 5,000 credits on your MiniMax Agent account to build your project. This usually takes around 3 hours — if you haven’t received them within 24 hours, feel free to contact us.
 Step 3: Build & Share
 Start building with MiniMax Agent. When your project is ready, share it to our Gallery, social media, and upload at least a 30-second demo video to X or YouTube to boost visibility. Not sure what to build? Remixing existing projects is totally allowed — and encouraged!
 Step 4: Promote your project!
 The more attention it gets, the higher your chances of winning a share of the $150,000 cash prize.
 Step 5: Submit your links at https://minimax-agent-hackathon.space.minimax.io/ and comment below
 Tracks and Prizes
  
Original Track 
 Use MiniMax Agent to build anything you want — then publish your project to the Gallery and share it on social media to attract as many remixes as possible.
 
 Remixing Track 
 Prefer remixing? Simply find a project you like, click the Remix button, and tell the Agent what you'd like to change. Then publish your version to the Gallery and share it on social media — that visibility could boost your chances of winning too!
 
  
https://preview.redd.it/vwr7uftqciif1.png?width=1600&format=png&auto=webp&s=46283ba28ee214712b71659ffe7e182a975353d8
 https://preview.redd.it/qlqroh7uciif1.png?width=1600&format=png&auto=webp&s=ddb67133ccb577c607dd2fd072dba58b53e9a544
 https://preview.redd.it/7ol3g8vxciif1.png?width=1600&format=png&auto=webp&s=d9ec6ce49ff175801dcd06eca5815b76a3a197f1
 FAQ
 What is Remix and how to remix others' work?
  
Remix makes it quick and easy to create your own version of others' project.
 See something interesting in Gallery? Just click Remix, tell MiniMax Agent what you'd like to change, and it will generate a new version for you.
  
Do I need coding skills to participate?
  
Not at all! Everyone can participate! Whether you're a developer, designer, student, or creator, you're welcome to join.What you can build
  
​Here are some example projects built with MiniMax Agent — for your inspiration and reference!
  
​7-Day Seattle-Japan itinerary & travel handbook: https://8222ea47.space.minimax.io/
 ​Virtual museum tour of The Louvre: https://4cwghqarlq.space.minimax.io/
 ​3D Globe with AI geographical teacher: https://7bkv6ou61ztu.space.minimax.io/
 ​AI piano studio: https://5b57ifeusinc.space.minimax.io/
  
Can I participate solo, or do I need a team?
  
You can participate solo or as part of a team — it’s entirely up to you.
  
Can I submit multiple projects?
  
Yes! Participants may submit multiple entries, but each submission must be unique and substantially different from your other entries.
  
​Tools and Technologies
 ​Access MiniMax Agent
 ​Inspiration
 ​MiniMax Agent: world's first full-stack AI Agent
 ​MinMax Agent: Remix Marketplace 
 ​Contact Us & Support Channels
 ​Discord
 ​X
 ​LinkedIn
 ​Additional Resource links
 ​MiniMax Website
 ​MiniMax GitHub
 ​MiniMax HuggingFace
    submitted by    /u/Pristine_Spirit_5081  
 [link]   [comments]
speedrun: The MiniMax AI Agent Challenge invites global developers to create innovative AI projects for a chance to win part of a $150,000 prize pool. Participants can utilize the MiniMax AI Agent, which simplifies complex tasks without coding, making it accessible to a wider audience. This competition encourages creativity across various fields, from productivity to entertainment, and aims to push the boundaries of AI capabilities.
why_it_matters: This challenge democratizes AI development, allowing non-coders to participate and innovate, potentially leading to groundbreaking applications that could reshape industries.
With significant financial incentives, the competition fosters a collaborative environment, encouraging participants to remix existing projects, thus accelerating the pace of AI advancements.

lenses.eli12: There's a new competition where anyone can create cool AI projects and win money! You don’t need to know how to code, and you can use a special tool called MiniMax Agent to help you. This is exciting because it lets more people share their ideas and make amazing things with AI.
lenses.pm: Developers, designers, and creators will use this competition to showcase their skills and innovative ideas. It solves the problem of accessibility in AI development by allowing non-coders to participate. The competitive advantage lies in the unique features of MiniMax Agent, which streamlines project creation, while the risk involves the potential for low-quality submissions that may not meet expectations.
lenses.engineer: The MiniMax AI Agent utilizes a multi-agent architecture to coordinate various specialized AI subagents, enabling it to handle complex, multimodal tasks efficiently. Its performance characteristics include rapid project development, allowing users to create applications in under an hour. However, limitations may arise in terms of the depth of customization available and the potential for resource-intensive tasks that could strain the system.
